column4: can you tell me how I can write grub to the MBR of my hard drive using GRML?  IS this why my computer just sits at "Loading Operating System..." for hours?
I just took out my hard drive out of one computer and put it in a new one I just built
ok the df - h doesn't look like it's going to help, (contents of live cd) and blkid looks like UUID's but I don 't know what to tdo withh those
what are you trying to do
